name: Security Force Bridgehead
text: When this card is activated: You can add 1 "Security Force" monster from your Deck to your hand. When an opponent's monster declares an attack on your "Security Force" monster in the same column: You can activate this effect; your monster cannot be destroyed by that battle. You can only use this effect of "Security Force Bridgehead" once per turn. You can only activate 1 "Security Force Bridgehead" per turn.
